para.text: splits all of the available view resources into categories so you can more easily find the views you want. As you click on a category icon the list of views in that category are displayed in the
to the right. Views can belong to more than one category and you may select more than one catetgory at a time to view the views in several categories at once.

You can re-categorize a view resource by by dragging it from the list pane and dropping it over a category icon. However, it is important to realize that when you categorize a view you are actually changing the class category for the class that owns it.
If you move or copy a view to a new category then you will have also done the same to all other resources belonging to the same class
